issue_title: [Enhancement] Add toggle method to flip done state

implementation.approach: Added toggle() method to Todo class that flips the done boolean and updates the updated_at timestamp. The method returns the new boolean state for convenience as specified in the acceptance criteria.
implementation.test_strategy: TDD - Added failing test first, then implemented the feature. Test verifies: 1) toggle() on undone todo returns True and sets done=True, 2) toggle() on done todo returns False and sets done=False, 3) updated_at is always updated.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: todo.toggle() on undone todo sets done=True and updates timestamp
todo.toggle() on done todo sets done=False and updates timestamp
toggle() returns the new boolean state for convenience

risks: Minimal - simple one-line implementation following existing patterns in mark_done() and mark_undone().
